alert.note: Alert for Carroll (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 7:28PM CDT until July 30 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Carroll County in northwestern Arkansas... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 728 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Carrollton, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Green Forest... Carrollton... Delmar... Coin... Connor... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
